page.title: 15The Nine Stones
page.content: The Nine Stones are quite famous. They are made of flint and stone. The tallest was two metres high.The smallest stone was covered by the roots of a tree. They are nine stones formed in a circle. Local superstition believes they have supernatural powers.Only a couple of years ago on different foggy evenings two cars were supposed to have been stopped by them.They have been there since 1500 B.C.and were probably a British temple. Half a mile West of the temple in the road is a large flat stone perhaps the remains of a cromleck.
